entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:39 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 08:10 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.3°C
Pressure: 103.0 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.0°C
Wind: ENE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this morning and ending this afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries later this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
